metadata.title: USN-6676-1 -- c-ares vulnerability
metadata.description: VojtÄ›ch Vobr discovered that c-ares incorrectly handled user input from  local configuration files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to  cause a denial of service via application crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6676-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libc-ares2 - 1.19.1-3ubuntu0.1 libc-ares-dev - 1.19.1-3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
